Typically used for debugging purposes.
TxContext - interface javax.jaxtx.TxContext.
This class represents a handle on a stack of transactions.
TxHandle - interface javax.jaxtx.TxHandle.
TxHandle is used as a representation of a single transaction when it is suspended from a running thread and may be later resumed.

U

UnknownParticipantException - exception javax.jaxtx.exceptions.UnknownParticipantException.
Thrown if an attempt is made to delist a participant that the coordinator has no knowledge about.

UnknownParticipantException(String, int) - Constructor for class javax.jaxtx.exceptions.UnknownParticipantException
 
UnknownStatus - class javax.jaxtx.status.UnknownStatus.
The state of the transaction is currently unknown.
UnknownStatus() - Constructor for class javax.jaxtx.status.UnknownStatus
 
UserTransaction - interface javax.jaxtx.UserTransaction.
The transaction interface is split into two: (i) the client component, which is typically only interested in starting and ending a transaction session.
UserTransactionFactory - interface javax.jaxtx.UserTransactionFactory.
The UserTransactionFactory is used to obtain a handle on a specific type of transaction model implementation.

valid() - Method in interface javax.jaxtx.TxContext
 
valid() - Method in interface javax.jaxtx.TxHandle
 
Vote - interface javax.jaxtx.model.btp.Vote.
All votes from prepare are instances of this interface.
VoteCancel - interface javax.jaxtx.model.btp.VoteCancel.
The inferior votes that it has cancelled.
VoteConfirm - interface javax.jaxtx.model.btp.VoteConfirm.
The inferior votes to confirm.
VoteResign - interface javax.jaxtx.model.btp.VoteResign.
The inferior votes that all of its inferiors have resigned from the transaction.

W

WrongStateException - exception javax.jaxtx.exceptions.WrongStateException.
Thrown if the state of the transaction is such that it disallows the attempted operation.
